frameset.edef: to specialize in, to major in

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-5 (DEM_PRON_F هٰذِهِ)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS لَيْسَت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-5)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG نُكْتَة)))) (CONJ فَ) (S (ADVP-PRD (ADV هُناكَ)) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN أَماكِن)) (SBAR (WHNP-6 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تَخَصَّصِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-6)) (PP-CLR (PREP فِي) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN بِيع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL مُخَلَّفات) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN المَطاعِم) (CONJ وِ) (DET+NOUN الفَنادِق)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الأَغْذِيَة)))))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (PP (PREP كَ) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذٰلِك))) (NOUN بِيع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN السِلَع) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG الغِذائِيَّة)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG المُنْتَهِيَة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الصَلاحِيَّة)))))) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NP (NOUN اسْعار)) (SBAR (WHNP-8 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV تِقِلّ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-8)) (NP-ADV (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC كَثِيراً)) (PP (PREP عَن) (NP (NP (NOUN سِعْر) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الحَقِيقِيّ))))))))))))))))))

arg.g: in selling the left over of food from restursnts and hotels

example.arg: فِي بِيع مُخَلَّفات المَطاعِم وِ الفَنادِق مِن الأَغْذِيَة
